name: ChaCha & JumJum
description:
Music is everywhere in our life.  Therefore, we create a simple music game for everyone to enjoy.  Just relax and have fun!

You can choose the song you like and change the color on the left before the game start! Enjoy your game~~~

-JumJum Game

Press the "Space" button to control your character and don't meet the pipes.

-ChaCha Game

Use "Left" and  "Right" button to move it. Try to catch the music notes and avoid the obstacles. 

Leave a comment to let us know what we can do to make it better.
